freshness.q: How long does peeled garlic stay fresh?
freshness.a: Our vacuum packaging ensures freshness for up to 45 days when refrigerated between 2°C and 4°C. Once opened, we recommend using it within 5-7 days for optimal flavor.

chemicals.q: Do you use preservatives or chemicals?
chemicals.a: Absolutely not. Our pneumatic peeling process uses only high-pressure air. We guarantee 100% natural garlic with no additives, whiteners, or chemical preservatives.

minimum.q: What is the minimum wholesale order quantity?

samples.q: Do you offer samples for restaurants?
